Sept. 19, 2010 D Wychavon Contest (Championship Section)
Wychavon Contest (Championship Section) 1 Entertainments Contest Wychavon Festival of Brass wychavon-contest-championship-section
All Saints Church, Evesham, Worcestershire, England, UK Best Soloist: Stephen Sykes (Tredegar) Best Percussion: Tredegar Prizes - 1st £1500, 2nd £600, 3rd £200. 5 bands competed.
Sept. 10, 2010, 7:54 a.m. July 8, 2020, 9:44 p.m.
1 Tredegar Town Band Ian Porthouse
2 BTM Band Tom Davoren
3 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band Mark Bentham
4 Milton Keynes Brass Craig Patterson
5 Phoenix West Midlands Brass Simon Platford
